newsitem.title: USA: Cambridge Technology to acquire Ramos.
newsitem.headline: Cambridge Technology to acquire Ramos.

text.p: Cambridge Technology Partners Inc said on Friday it agreed to acquire Ramos & Associates Inc in accordance with an agreement signed on October 31.
The transaction, expected to close by December 2, will be completed in a stock-for-stock acquisition in which Cambridge will issue up to 1,175,200 shares for all of Ramos' outstanding securities.
Cambridge shares were trading up 1-1/2 to 34-1/2 at midday.
Cambridge is an international client or server and Internet systems integrator.
Ramos is a strategic information solutions consulting firm. Its revenues for 1995 were $11.8 million, and $17.5 million for the first nine months of 1996.
